characteristics.description: The T-800 is a cybernetic organism: living tissue over a metal endoskeleton.

specifications.weapons: Various, including plasma rifles and conventional firearms

strengths: Living tissue makes it difficult to detect
weaknesses: Easily identified once tissue is damaged
Susceptible to extreme damage and EMPs

quotes: Come with me if you want to live.

characteristics.description: The T-1000 is composed of mimetic polyalloy, able to mimic shapes and appearances.

specifications.weapons: Shapeshifts into stabbing and cutting weapons

weaknesses: Cannot form complex machinery or chemicals

characteristics.description: The T-X is a hybrid terminator with a solid endoskeleton covered by mimetic polyalloy.

specifications.weapons: Plasma cannon, flamethrower, and built-in advanced weapons

strengths: Combines the strengths of T-800 and T-1000
weaknesses: More complex and potentially less reliable

quotes: I don't suppose you know who I am, do you?

characteristics.description: The Rev-9 has an advanced carbon-based endoskeleton and a separate liquid metal exterior.
strengths: Can split into two independent units
weaknesses: Requires significant energy to maintain dual forms
Liquid metal part is vulnerable when separated

quotes: You are not the threat. It’s your womb.
Sorry. You don’t get to know my name.

characteristics.description: The T-3000 is a human converted into a terminator using machine-phase matter.
strengths: Human brain provides advanced strategic thinking
Highly adaptable and versatile in combat
weaknesses: Complexity of conversion makes it unstable
Extreme magnetic fields can disrupt functionality

quotes: I'm not a machine. Not yet.
You can't kill me. I am more.
